summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Service Renewal Hub application. Backend APIs working well (17/24 tests passed), frontend UI fully functional with successful registration, login, service management, and dashboard features. Main issue is email reminder functionality due to missing Resend API key configuration.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Email reminder fails due to missing Resend API key

minor_issues.issue: Return 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Status code inconsistency, but security works

passed_tests: Add service modal and form submission
Service table display and status badges
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure Resend API key in backend/.env to enable email reminder functionality. All other features working correctly.
